data.name: PKW.FUN
content: A meh, {{mostly useless multi-tool}} that just opens a bunch of {{web pages}} I use - plus a DDoS tool that {{probably doesn’t even work}} because, y’know, cool factor.
The project’s {{unfinished}}, and a bunch of features aren’t even coded. I {{gave it up}} because I got bored and wanted to step away from {{Python}} for a while.

data.name: Discord Self-Bot
content: A fun little {{Discord self-bot}} I built - now completely {{broken}}, and the only fix would be to {{recode it}} into a proper {{Discord Bot}}.
I actually did that once, but... I {{lost the files}}. Classic me. So yeah, this project’s dead and buried - probably won’t make another one, ecsdi.

data.name: sudopkw.github.io
content: Wild, right? {{This website}} itself is one of my projects - built as a way to understand {{SQL}}, {{HTML}}, and {{CSS}} better.
I don’t really see myself going into full web dev, but it was a {{fun experiment}} to {{learn something new}} and {{explore other languages}} :D
I’ll keep {{updating}} this site as I {{learn}} more and {{grow}} in other areas. Hopefully, it’ll be stacked with new projects and experiences soon :)
Also, Big thanks to {{Arthur Wallendorff}} for letting people (including me) use and modify his WallenArt GitHub as a base to {{learn}} and {{improve skills}}.
If I ever make my own site from scratch, it’ll be {{heavily inspired}} by this one. I’m obsessed with {{TUI}} design - can’t believe something so sleek exists.
